remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation relies on value equivalence of the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventHandlerInfo.Handler%2A><xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventHandlerInfo.InvokeHandledEventsToo%2A> properties. The <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventHandlerInfo.Handler%2A> property is a delegate reference. Therefore, equivalence implies a duplicate reference to the same handler.
